info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 5:25PM CDT until August 03 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MADISON AND NORTHEASTERN ST. CLAIR COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN ILLINOIS... At 525 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Troy, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... St. Jacob, Marine and Highland. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Illinois between exits 21 and 24. Interstate 55 in Illinois near exit 23. Interstate 64 in Illinois near exit 14. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
